thread.title: Oracle, HP, Cisco embrace the cloud - Contra Costa Times
thread.title_full: Oracle, HP, Cisco embrace the cloud - Contra Costa Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Contra Costa Times
title: Oracle, HP, Cisco embrace the cloud - Contra Costa Times
text:
A billowing Internet cloud is enveloping some of Silicon Valley's legendary companies, forcing an upheaval in the way they've done business for decades. In what some would say is an overdue recognition that the cloud is the future of computing, venerable valley companies like Hewlett-Packard, Oracle and Cisco Systems are scrambling to build data centers, launch new business lines, create cloud services and convert software that came in a box to software that's rented over the Internet.
 Contra Costa Times.
